# isoCurrencies

**Type Property**

An array containing currencies defined by the currency codes in ISO-4217.

## Declaration

```swift
static var isoCurrencies: [Locale.Currency] { get }
```

## Using common currencies

- **unknown**: A representation of an “unknown” currency, for use with transactions that don’t involve any currency.

items.description: A representation of an “unknown” currency, for use with transactions that don’t involve any currency.
items.name: unknown
